name: Paul Medvedev
content: Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology | Eberly College of Science Skip to main content Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology (BMB) Probing the behaviors of molecules, cells, and biological systems. Undergraduate Programs Learning about genomics, cloning, stem cells, cancer biology, microarrays, emerging diseases, and neurodegenerative diseases. BMB majors lead to exciting and rewarding careers! EXPLORE OUR PROGRAMS! Make discoveries and generate new knowledge through independent, original dissertation research in biochemistry, microbiology, and molecular biology (BMMB) laboratories. EXPLORE THE GRADUATE PROGRAM! Lloyd Huck Early Career Chair in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology Learn More About Melanie Join Our Department The Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology at Penn State invites applications for multiple tenure-track assistant professor appointments in the broad areas of microbiology—including bacteriology, mycology, parasitology, and virology—and genetics and cell and developmental biology.
